items.sentence: I found something out about Tom that I think that you should know.
The police didn't think that it was likely Tom had killed himself.
Mary and her boyfriend often hang out with Tom and his girlfriend.
Don't buy flowers for yourself. Let someone else buy them for you.
Forget your troubles for a while and come and have dinner with us.
Of all the countries that you've visited, which was your favorite?
Tom is suffering from a mental disorder that impairs his judgment.
I think that wouldn't have happened if Tom had been there with us.
Tom has started coughing heavily and I'm worried about his health.
Tom said that he loved Mary, but that he didn't want to marry her.
I would hate to see him mess up one of his butterfly knife tricks.
Tom tried to show the picture to Mary without letting John see it.
I'll introduce you to a friend of mine who used to live in Boston.
I've never sewn a button on a shirt before. Could you show me how?
I hope that I'll have a chance to see you next time I'm in Boston.
My younger brother and I used to fight a lot when we were younger.
I should probably buy a few bottles of wine for the party tonight.
Tom realized he barely had enough money to buy what he had to buy.
A number of interesting objects are being exhibited at the museum.
The walls of the house are pale yellow, the shutters rust-colored.
